vsParam:
Hmm, so this is how the Donner Stone looks like
in this world... Um? Isn't it just a stone!?

Of course, this is a "Donnerst".
But what is a Donner Stone...

A bomb with thunder twined around it.
Just as its name implies, it looks more like a stone.

Yeah. Back in my world, it's also called a "Donner Stone".
I think Totori once made a "Donner Stone" too?
I think it's just an abbreviation...

Maybe.
At least, I have never seen it.

Yeah, "Donnersts" will trigger storms,
while Donner Stones will summon thunders!

Thunders...
It sounds like a potent bomb.

I'm very powerful, but I tend to take cover
in [px]'s backpack at the sound of thunder!

Fine...
I can't believe even Master Peppermint is fearful of something.

Yeah... Sure!
But just fearful of a few things!

Jesus!! Hey, don't frighten me like that!
It'll still shock me even though I'm not afraid!

Haha, sorry! Let's talk about things
Master Peppermint is fearful of later...
It's kind of awesome if you can control wind and thunder.

Yeah, you don't say!?
All the items made with alchemy are powerful.

Use the power of nature to make items and
control them freely... Alchemists are very great.

Great? I'm really flattered.
I think you will also become a great alchemist, Nelke!
Yeah! Nelke has the making of becoming an alchemist!
So... you need to try your best to finish your assignment!

Great... Ah!
I accidentally dropped my Donnerst...!

Ahhh, the wind, ahhh! It'll blow me away!
Help, [px]~! Gosh!!!!
